content: stockinette stitch pattern with us 13/9mm needles in the round instructions instructions are written for fingering weight yarn sport weight dk worsted weight aran weight bulky and super bulky weight instructions are in parenthesis in that order change to double pointed 2 circulars or 1 long circular needle as needed when working the crown decreases an x is used to mark the place where there are no more stitches to be worked with smaller needles co 154 126 104 91 78 60 52 sts pm join in the round being careful not to twist stitches tip for a smooth join knit the first stitch with the tail and then continue with the working yarn work k1 p1 rib for 2in switch to larger needles increase as follows *kfb k10 8 12 12 12 5 3 * repeat to end of round 168 140 112 98 84 70 65 sts round 1 *k11 9 7 6 5 4 4 sl1* repeat to end of round always slip_stitch purlwise going into the stitch as if to purl round 2 knit repeat these 2 rounds until piece measures 8in from co edge having completed row 2 crown shaping round 1 *k2tog k9 7 5 4 3 2 2 sl1* repeat to end of round 154 126 98 84 70 56 52 sts round 2 and all even rnds knit round 3 *k10 8 6 5 4 3 3 sl1* repeat to end of round i am no longer going to list even numbered rnds all even rnds are knit round 5 *k2tog k8 6 4 3 2 1 1 sl1* repeat to end of round 140 112 84 70 56 42 39 sts round 7 *k9 7 5 4 3 2 2 sl1* repeat to end of round round 9 *k2tog k7 5 3 2 1 0 0 sl1* repeat to end of round 126 98 70 56 42 28 26 sts for bulky weight version only rnds 10 & 11 *k2tog* repeat to end of round pull yarn through remaining 7 stitches skip down to finishing for super bulky weight version only round 10 *k2tog* repeat to end of round 13 sts round 11 *k2tog* repeat to last st k1 7 sts pull yarn through remaining 7 stitches skip down to finishing round 11 *k8 6 4 3 2 x x sl1* repeat to end of round round 13 *k2tog k6 4 2 1 0 x x sl1* repeat to end of round 112 84 56 42 28 x x sts for aran weight version only rnds 14 & 15 *k2tog* repeat to end of round pull yarn through remaining 7 stitches skip down to finishing round 15 *k7 5 3 2 x x x sl1* repeat to end of round round 17 *k2tog k5 3 1 0 x x x sl1* repeat to end of round 98 70 42 28 x x x sts for worsted weight version only rnds 18 & 19 *k2tog* repeat to end of round pull yarn
